description: A portDown trap indicates that the Ethernet port went down
from the operational stage.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDown CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex i 9999 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr s EXAMPLE CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portOperStatus i 2 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portAdminStatus i 1

description: A unique value, starting at 1, for each physical Ethernet port.
The value is expected to remain constant for a given port after
reboot.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
Ethernet port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr

description: The current operational status of the port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portOperStatus

description: The current administrative status of the port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portAdminStatus

description: A portUp trap indicates that the Ethernet port came up and
is in operational stage.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portUp CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex i 9999 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr s EXAMPLE CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portOperStatus i 1 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portAdminStatus i 1

description: A unique value, starting at 1, for each physical Ethernet port.
The value is expected to remain constant for a given port after
reboot.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
Ethernet port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr

description: The current operational status of the port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portOperStatus

description: The current administrative status of the port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portAdminStatus

description: This trap indicates a change in status of PSE as indicated
in the portPseDetectionStatus object.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPsePortStatusChangeNotification CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex i 9999 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr s EXAMPLE CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPseDetectionStatus i 1 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPsePower i 1 CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPseClass i 1

description: A unique value, starting at 1, for each physical Ethernet port.
The value is expected to remain constant for a given port after
reboot.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
Ethernet port.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portDescr

description: Describes the operational status of the port PD detection.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPseDetectionStatus

description: On-off state of the PoE device.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPsePower

description: Describes the PSE class of the device.
variables.name: CP-ETHERNET-MIB::portPseClass
